title: High electrification / High local production
description: Scenario created by DfE and SONI. Explores high electrification on the demand side, combined with high local production of RES on the supply side

title: Renewable gases / Import oriented
description: Scenario created by DfE and SONI. Explores high use of renewable gases on the demand side, combined with high imports on the supply side

title: Renewable gases / High local production
description: Scenario created by DfE and SONI. Explores high use of renewable gases on the demand side, combined with high local production of RES on the supply side
